name: Spinneria
description:
You play the role of the famous pizza chef Mario.

Complete the orders you receive and make the perfect pizza.

Testimonials 

"A spinning masterpiece" - Kotaku

"I have an italian friend whom I love; I love this game even more" - IGN

"Nice" - Fred's mom

Winner of Best Visuals in Create Jam Fall 2017

Controls

Left/Right: A/D - Left analog stick

Spin: Mouse - Right analog stick

Credits
  • Lasse Westmark - 3D artist
  • Hugo Hallé - 2D artist
  • Andreas Thomsen - Game Designer/Programmer
  • Jon Aschberg - Programmer
  • Christopher Starck - Programmer
  • nosoapradio.us - Music
  • "Slice Me Nice" by Fancy - Theme
